title: Team-Based Learning Course in Pharmacotherapy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic pharmacology and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: A pharmacotherapy education program for pre-service and in-service teachers, requiring the establishment of a digital device-enabled and team-based collaborative learning environment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the therapeutic mechanisms and side effects of major drug classes with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can analyze real clinical cases and propose appropriate pharmacological treatment plans in teams with a 90% completion rate.
Learners can identify and present over 75% of drug interaction risk factors through team-based quizzes.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
